title: Basketball Warm-up & Cool-down
notes: Block 5 Week 2: Basketball session (evening). Dynamic warm-up before playing + mobility cool-down after. Complements Monday AM chest/triceps training. Focus on movement prep and recovery.

items.name: Brisk Walk
items.notes: Light cardio to raise heart rate and body temperature

items.name: Leg Swings
items.notes: Forward/back and side-to-side for hip mobility

items.name: Arm Circles
items.notes: Shoulder mobility and upper body activation

items.name: Bodyweight Squat
items.notes: Activate glutes, quads, and hip flexors

items.name: Inchworm
items.notes: Full-body activation: hamstrings, core, shoulders

items.name: High Knees
items.notes: Light intensity to elevate heart rate

items.name: Butt Kicks
items.notes: Activate hamstrings and warm up knee flexion

items.name: Lateral Shuffle
items.notes: Basketball-specific movement pattern

items.name: Carioca Drill
items.notes: Hip mobility and coordination for lateral movement

items.name: Basketball Movement Prep
items.notes: Light dribbling, layups, shooting to prepare for game intensity

items.name: Brisk Walk
items.notes: Bring heart rate down gradually after playing

items.name: Standing Quad Stretch
items.notes: 30s per leg. Release tension from running/jumping

items.name: Standing Hamstring Stretch
items.notes: 30s per leg. Target hamstrings after sprints

items.name: Hip Flexor Stretch
items.notes: 30s per side. Release hip flexors from running/cutting

items.name: Figure-4 Glute Stretch
items.notes: 30s per side. Glute and hip recovery

items.name: Calf Stretch (Wall or Step)
items.notes: 30s per leg. Release calves after jumping

items.name: Doorway Chest Stretch
items.notes: 30s per side. Open up chest after AM pressing

items.name: Cross-Body Shoulder Stretch
items.notes: 30s per arm. Shoulder recovery from shooting

items.name: Child's Pose
items.notes: Full-body relaxation and recovery breathing

items.name: Deep Breathing
items.notes: 2-3 min box breathing (4-4-4-4) to calm nervous system
